comment: Professor Feliciano has been one of the most respectful and kind instructor I have met so far at my journey at KSU! The other reviews aren't accurate and were made out of spite because they cheated. While there is a lot of material covered in his class, it's easy for us to understand and learn from. He isn't a harsh grader, so easy A's.

A lot of people who wrote these bad reviews wrote it cause they cheated and got caught. Don't let the review decieve you hes literally amazing. He cares about the students and participation matters. If you have an excuse he listens and understands. Dr. Q keeps it real.

I had him for lab, and it was a very chill experience. The workload wasn't bad just make sure to submit the lab worksheet within a week, and you'll be fine. Also, don't forget to take the pre and pos lab quizzes. He's a good lab instructor, especially compared to what I've heard about his lectures. I definitely recommend taking him for lab.

Amazing teacher! He sets clear expectations. Attendance is important so you don't miss anything. Provides a ton of information to help you be successful. He's also very caring and funny! Definitely one of the best biology teachers here!

He is passionate, but he is new and not good at teaching yet. In-class assignments were incohesive because of the size of the class, and he switched up on us mid-semester and made exams lockdown browser with webcam.

you can tell that he's very passionate about the subject, he just isn't good at teaching it. lectures go on the whole period and he has random in class assignments, which you are penalized for missing but won't say if we're having one. the class is hard, but there is extra credit. he's also kind of annoying about lockdown browser and webcam.

He teaches really fast but I knew this coming in. Lecture heavy, if your a science major interested in actually learning what you are reading then he doesn't mind helping. He loves what he does but class is hard with all the information that may not be his fault but maybe the department. Please go to class. He actually does notice.

rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Very smart, but not a good lecturer. Long, unhelpful lectures, inconsistent expectations, and participation quizzes not graded for completion. You teach yourself most of the time. Lots of extra credit, so it's hard to fail, but it feels like a waste. Superquiz every other week (lockdown browser and monitored). Take someone else if you can.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Beware of pop quizzes
